42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Talhah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: '; The angels do not enter a house in which there is a dog or a picture

chapter.ara-name: باب امْتِنَاعِ الْمَلاَئِكَةِ مِنْ دُخُولِ بَيْتٍ فِيهِ كَلْبٌ
chapter.eng-name: The Abstinence Of The Angels From Entering A House In Which There Is A Dog
